website_summaries.verdict: Choose from 10 hot sauces and play the "Pepper Pyramid Challenge," from mild to hot.
pros: You can make your own hot sauce challenge games with wings, burgers, etc
Sauces are tasty, and it's a fun game to play with your buddies
cons: Heat lovers may not feel these sauces are hot enough

customer_reviews.title: Hot Party in a Box
customer_reviews.text: Awesome concept and fun for those who like it HOT! I personally don't like the vinegary taste in all the sauces, but absolutely does not take away from the FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Really FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this game and the sauce. I think most of the reviews think it will be like the hot sauce challenge on YouTube. The flavors are really good...and HOT!!! I made it to number 3. Our son in law made it ALL THE WAY. It has a vinegar base which may be the reason for some of the reviews??? We had fun and my son in law got to take them all home for being the winner!!! Would make a great Christmas gift too.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HOT SAUCE COMPANY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love to make chili in the winter time and now I have 10 different flavors I can add to each batch. I couldn't get past #8, but I'm not a chile pepper crazed person. I simply like the sauces to add to my normal everyday cooking. All these hot sauces are made very simply for the challenge. This company has other hot sauces that are more in depth in the ingredients. Zombie Cajun is by far my favorite hot sauce in the industry. Ot all has great flavor. 5 stars across the board!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concept!
customer_reviews.text: We are very into hot sauce and we’re wanting to try some new ones and this challenge is great for that. The only thing I wish was that the 8-10 were like extreme hot, like unbearably hot since it is a challenge and I like to win. Definitely a good add to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly spicy enough.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking but kinda bulky and unnecessarily large packaging. I have now tried the top 4 hottest flavors and I am not impressed at all with the amount of burn. I am a guy who will sweat from the burn from Habanero Peppers and the Carolina Reaper doesn't even make my mouth hurt. I would compare it to a regular everyday Red Pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tyler Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Where is the spice?!
customer_reviews.text: If you like colorful bottles filled with water and a hint of a pepper, these are for you. If you actually want to do a spice challenge, look elsewhere. With all the warnings on the box I lightly brushed the chicken with the three "spiciest" sauces. Once I took a bite, I opened the bottles and poured it on, still, really not much happening. Hopefully the sauces still have a great taste to add to food? No. They do not. I have been looking forward to having my own little hot sauce challenge and I am still looking forward to when that will ever happen. Don't waste your money or time here.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great time with friends!
customer_reviews.text: The challenge is fun for all ages. I have done it twice now. I completed it the first time and the second time had me in tears and I tapped at #9. Fun for anyone who loves a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant M

customer_reviews.title: Huh..... Not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: So, the first 4 "sauces" are all a pale green color, and are liquid. Not the consistency of any kind of any hot sauce I've ever seen. They're the consistency of water. They all have very minor heat. We put them on plain chicken wings, and it made the wings taste like salt and vinegar chips. Bottles 5-10 are all still very liquidy, but better, more consistent with normal hot sauces. Frankly the flavors aren't particularly good. It's heat for heat sake. That, and the scovile units reported are not even close to accurate. The 8th sauce is the hottest, by a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Missing sauces!
customer_reviews.text: I was taste testing all of them when I started to realize that I was missing some sauces and in the place of those missing sauces was duplicated sauces. Really disappointing because I was excited to try all of them.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie T

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.  A fancy box with basic products.
customer_reviews.text: The sauces have no personality. Just some vinegar and the pepper. Now that I have the box I would say it is overpriced. Should be $30
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: Weak....watered down
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is cool, the hot sauces themselves fail to deliver. The only sauces with heat are levels 8 (ghost pepper) and 9 (scorpion pepper). Every other sauce is weak until that point and level 10 (carolina reaper) felt like it should have been level 5. Not what I expected, not worth the price. Spend some money on individual hot sauces, instead of this watered down garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jago

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money- not as hot as it claims!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for hubby for Christmas bc he LOVES spicy hot food- most of the time I can't even stand the smell! This is supposedly rated as super hot at the #10- and according to him has much less heat than some regular store bought hot sauces. I'm truly disappointed in this because we were expecting something that actually had real heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Fun box and set up but not so hot heat
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun challenge to do. If you enjoy hot sauce and want a good burn however, don’t buy this. I love hot sauce. I wouldn’t say that i can handle really hot wings that well and these 10 sauces weren’t hot at all. There is absolutely no way the top sauce is 1 million scolville units. The box is fun and the set up is fun but disappointed in the heat. Some of the sauces actually tasted good but most were awful. I’d save the $30 and buy a better more name brand set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Abraham

customer_reviews.title: It's great, a little pricey for the size of the bottles
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are small, and there is no plastic stopper, so the sauce comes roaring out and gets messy. Some of the flavors are great, I really like the Habanero. Some are not so good. The banana pepper has a good flavor but is basically just the juice from a jar of banana peppers, is so liquidy I can't really call it a sauce. The presentation is nice, this would make a great gift. It's a little pricey for such small bottles though for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to hot...
customer_reviews.text: We did a hot wing challenge at a friends house. We made a semi big deal out of it and took a couple weeks to let the anticipation build up. I marinated a steak in some 350k 357 Sauce and about died. It was a good build up to compare the hotter sauces in the challenge. We got through these 10 without much burn. We used the 357 as the final burn. This package is fun for a night of people wanting to participate in something fun but not dangerous. It is by far not for people looking for the real burn.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Morawski

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Hot Sauces
customer_reviews.text: Got my son this as a gift for Christmas. He is a hot sauce lover. Only issue with the set is that there were two "9"s and no "8". However, the "9" was one of our favorite flavors. So getting two of them turned out to be a good thing. All of the sauces had a good flavor, which is sometimes not the case with the higher heat level sauces. It is better to combine taste with heat, not just heat for heat's sake. We will now look for our favorite flavors in full size bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I cooked up a bunch of wings and took the challenge. Most of the early sauces tasted great (number 3 is the best). I was getting worried that we had gotten ripped off or that I had too much of a spice tolerance, then I got to number 8. That hit my friends and I like a truck- we all started going into a manic laughter and probably drooled all over my table. Definitely worth the money, we had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for people who like hot sauce.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who loves spice, and he just so happened to have burgers for dinner. Everyone at the party ended up trying one of these, turns out they were a hit. The presentation looks really nice when you open the box, and it's easy to tell what goes where. A few of these tasted oddly similar, but that could be partially because my taste buds were burnt from trying the carolina reaper sauce (not great with spice tolerance myself!) Protip: the banana pepper hot sauce tastes great on burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Stocklin

customer_reviews.title: It was a HIT
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for a young man that LOVES hot sauces! He was very excited with the gift and the way the challenge game was presented and plans on playing it with his hot-loving friends. The only exception is that one of the bottles had dried "stuff" around the top of the lid. He will wash it off to see if the seal was compromised. Otherwise he was very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Sauces aren't very good.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the sauces aren't good. Way too much vinegar and not much actual pepper taste. Two things were also missing from my box, the dropper which I wasn't too concerned about, but also one of the sauces was doubled while another was missing completely.
customer_reviews.author: SarahAnn Login

customer_reviews.title: Nice amount of spice
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I used these sauces to do a version of Hot Ones over zoom. It was a lot of funny. Spice definitely jumps up at around level 7 or so, but the flavors are there. I used the Habanero one to make a mango hot sauce and it turned out pretty good and nicely hot. This is a good deal for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying 10 different hot sauces
customer_reviews.text: I can't say more than 1 or 2 sauces actually tasted good. They all kind of have a bad/weird taste. And also if you're looking into this you should know that the challenge is to pour the sauce on a spoon and eat it... more gross. We wanted to do it on hot wings but it caused them to barely be spicy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Bolter

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun with our family doing the hot sauce challenge. Everyone loved it, what a great idea. All the teens and adults had a blast! We did go lower on the drops suggested, next time we will go up one more drop. I highly recommend getting this game. The sauces tasted great and did not disappoint in the heat. Thank you for coming up with this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Guy

customer_reviews.title: Missing bottles.  Contents not complete.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Christmas gift. Package looks good. Sure the hot sauce is good. I ordered it in plenty of time... got it on December 21st. But... I open the box to check it out and it is missing bottles. So. It is 3 days to Christmas, and I have to give a gift that is not complete. Disappointing and embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun with friends
customer_reviews.text: I find these don’t get “hot” until about number 7... but I do appreciate that novices could have a crack at it, too. Mine came without a dropper, but we just used toothpicks, instead. Overall, a bit kitschy, but I guess that’s what I was going for - I mean, I bought a hot sauce challenge set, after all.
customer_reviews.author: dauidus

customer_reviews.title: Fun challenge!
customer_reviews.text: Fun challenge, the 3 hottest will scald your tongue a bit but are still tolerable. But I’m a hot sauce maniac, others who have tried didn’t think they were as tolerable. Younger sister tried to be bold and have the hottest and she played it cool for a few seconds then coughed with watery eyes LOL! My favorite flavor wise was the scotch bonnet!!
customer_reviews.author: Dlee16

customer_reviews.title: Fun challenge.
customer_reviews.text: It's a neat gift, was missing one so contacted the company and they got it to us right away. The last one was definitely spicy. I think out of all of them the majority only liked the taste of one or two...but we didn't purchase for the taste. Purchased for the challenge. It was a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tamie Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Fun but one dimensional
customer_reviews.text: Had fun for a few rounds, definitely starts getting hot for people that don't do much spice. My only complaint is all the sauces are the same recipe, other than the featured pepper. Would really have enjoyed some unique changes throughout, would justify another purchase for a more exciting edition
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely horrible. It didn't get hot till #7 and I have had tobasco sauce hotter. I purchased it for family fun trying to reproduce a hot ones challenge but even my 8 year old was able to take the #10 Carolina reaper sauce. I had to taste it multiple times to even feel a real burn. I also purchased the Bomb which absolutely burned the entire house. Do not buy this set it's a complete rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Starkie

customer_reviews.title: A fun challenge! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This set is alot of fun! We enjoy challenging ourselves with the different levels of heat. Its lasting a long time since the hotter sauces only require a drop or two. And you get a free extra bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: HAVENT USED YET but my dad loves the gift
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves watching a guy on YouTube that interviews celebrities and they eat these wings covered in hot sauce during this interview. I think it’s called “The Hot Ones” and I couldn’t find any of the hot sauces that they use so I got this! He likes the idea of it and we are waiting for a perfect family game night to bring this challenge out!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Good collection of sauces, for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Good set of hot sauces for tasting or a competition. Not as hot as I would have thought-the reaper sauce was not as intense as others I have had. Also, in the package, we were missing a bottle of scorpion pepper, but got 2 habaneros instead. Make sure you check yours when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: van z

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as claimed; but fun.
customer_reviews.text: Was fun to do with the kids and friends. I do not believe it’s as hot as claimed; my 10 year old completed the challenge with no problem. I compared the hottest “2,100,000” to another hot sauce (da bomb) at 1,500,00 and da bomb is much hotter. It was still fun to do with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Momobile

customer_reviews.title: Mispackaged
customer_reviews.text: My box came with no scorpion pepper or "#9" but with two Carolina reapers/"#10". Very disappointed in that. The sauces weren't as spicy as expected, though some did have a nice flavor. I wish I would have received all 10 sauces or could at least have a little money refunded because of the packaging mishap, seeing as it wouldnt allow me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea/game helpful costume support, sauces lack heat though :-/
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for making such a fun game I love hot sauce and am a huge fan of pushing the limits so this product is was fun to try, that being said I was a little disappointed in the actual heat of the sauces they really didn't get that hot. I only noticed any heat after 7 and 10 was a lasting burn but never really got that hott in my opinion. It is a great idea and fun game though and a very friendly staff so I support whole heartedly what they are doing I only hope that they make hotter sauces in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah L Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Great hot sauce
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very pleased with these sauces. They are very hot but also have a lot of flavor. My only disappointment is that we accidently recieved two level 3s and no level 7 bottles, So I do have to take away a star. I was looking forward to trying that flavor so I am a bit bummed. UPDATE: I never heard from the company about my issue with my first package, but my brother loved the box so much we ended up ordering again anyways. The second box we recieved included all sauces.
customer_reviews.author: dayna

customer_reviews.title: HOT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister because she always bragged about loving hot sauce. I thought I found some she couldn't actually tolerate. She proved me wrong and said all the sauces had great flavor. Hot Sauce Lovers check it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine T

customer_reviews.title: Missing sauces!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this present which was supposed to be a Christmas present and I opened it to make sure that they were no price tags for anything. I am missing a sauce and there’s no way to contact the seller on the website
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Dropper and the heat
customer_reviews.text: Neat gift set however we did not receive the dropper that is in the “pre-challenge set up” that shows as provided. Definitely not as hot as we expected them to be but we all had fun anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia F

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Terrible.. no heat on majority of sauce.. packaging got multiple sauce that were the same.. 6 of us all felt same way with a couple that are not hot spice fans.. store bought light peppers are stronger then the caralina reaper in this kit.. very dissapointed.. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Tony Schimmel

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my boyfriend loved it. He really enjoys spicy food and some of the sauces he felt were hot! A nice variety of flavors and cute gift.
customer_reviews.author: miranda doyel

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas fun gift and it did not disappoint. I’ve seen other comments stating the sauces were not hot as expected. Eating spicy foods is subjective anyway. If you like ridiculously hot and spicy foods, you can win this game. It was plenty hot for us and a lot of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Tidm

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved this as a gift. He went straight for the Carolina reaper and said it was the hottest thing he ever tasted. This is great for the variety of sauces but we don't plan on using it as a game.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Milbradt

customer_reviews.title: Vegan hot sauce gift set/challenge game
customer_reviews.text: Love that it was vegan as it was a gift for my son who is vegan. He loves hot sauce so that's why I got it as it many small bottles to try. It's a challenge game also which is neat if you wanted to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Craftable

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.text: I feel these scoville units are way off. #5 which is 50k is much hotter than #7 which claims to be 600k. 8,9 and 10 are all the same. ive had an 800k scoville sauce that made the 2mil sauce seem like milk. would suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed my box has a defective bottle. I can't return it or get to anyone to assist me. Since I'm stuck with it I'll try the others, I hope they don't disappoint me. I really wanted that Ghost Pepper sauce first, it's my favorite pepper. Now I have to throw it away and buy some more elsewhere. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lige

customer_reviews.title: The flavors are unique and wonderful. The price point is perfect
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing and fun product! The flavors are unique and wonderful! As a lover of hot sauce I found this challenge to be awesome! The price point is perfect. Will definitely order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki, Lelu and Damian

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor, but not hot
customer_reviews.text: So, I was pretty happy with this for the most part, because the sauces had some really nice flavor, but over all, I wasn’t really impressed. They weren’t very spicy at all. They had a little kick to them, but over all, I wash they were hotter. The worst I got was Bailey a runny nose, and I was expecting the Carolina reaper to be really hot, and maybe make me shed a few tears, but it wasn’t really that hot...
customer_reviews.author: Amber Shifflett

customer_reviews.title: Hot Sauce variety
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was my fault- but I didn't check the size of the bottles. It was and still is being enjoyed!! Many, many different kinds!
customer_reviews.author: carlota132

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I am relaying what my daughter in law told me (I ordered and had it shipped to them for Christmas): We love the Hot Sauce challenge gift set!! It looks amazing and when your son is being a jerk, I am using the hot hot stuff on his food! Haha, kidding! They both loved receiving it and are looking forward to trying all of the flavors. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried it.
customer_reviews.text: i went straight for the number 10, drank out of the bottle. I have hotter sauce in my life, and worse from a mild pepper that is sitting in my back yard. It was intense for the first few min then it faded. Now I am just drinking them all to myself and not even going to try the challenge with my friends. ALL FOR ME AND NO ONE ELSE
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: More gimmick than quality.
customer_reviews.text: More of a gimmick than a set of quality hotsauces. The hotsauces are pretty weak until the last few. Most of them dont have much flavor and have a watered down consistency. This could be a fun gift for those who dont really eat much spicy food or hot sauces, otherwise you'd be better off building your own set by buying individual sauces with known quality, flavor, and reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Catano

customer_reviews.title: Tastes okay, not even close to as hot as advertised. Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Expected a hot sauce challenge to be hot. The scoville units used on the bottles are not even close to what is in the bottles. The hottest sauce in the kit is just about the same as Tabasco Brand habanero sauce which isn't even in the same ballpark as something at a true 2 million.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Very watery
customer_reviews.text: Don’t taste good, are very watery. I pretty sure they are to add into another sauce or something. Also not very hot. The scolville rating is just the pepper used not the bottles contents
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Read me!
customer_reviews.text: The sauces are small about the size of a travel pack of hot sauce but enough to make 10 wings out of each bottle! Really good flavor! It makes for amazing flavor on wings! But on wings after #7 good luck! Ever see a group of adults cry at the same time? Now you will! Would definitely buy again! #1-3 have the best flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Armazi

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe for the cost how good these hot sauces taste. The hottest one even has a delightful taste but is hot.
customer_reviews.author: FloodMan

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Awsome and definitely a challenge. Me and my 11 year old son did it and were running around the house eating bread and drinking milk it was so crazy
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Product for Adventurous Palates
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift, qualty packaging and cost efficient. Each bottle contains high quality hot sauce. Perfect for adventurous palates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I thought for the price it was a deal but nope, got ripped off. it's too small so wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: R. SHARMA

customer_reviews.title: Not spicy!!!
customer_reviews.text: A complete dud. Family had a hot sauce challenge with this product. Was just a waste of time sauce after sauce no spice, all watered down vinegar. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: NONAME

customer_reviews.title: Great Varity and presentation.
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I decided to try the "Hot ones" challenge with this. It was going pretty well and we enjoyed the heat of each tube as we went up. My only complaint is the very last one, #10, the hottest one was not actually hot. It was more on the scale of #6-7 for us. I'm not sure if it was just old or what happened, but was saddened by the sudden drop from 9-10. Besides that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Thphlstr

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but quality control on packing the product needs some help
customer_reviews.text: The taste was good and the variety was good the comsept of the hot Sauce challenge was cool. But if you get this check the bottles first I got 2 of the same kind but marked as different kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin mulhall

customer_reviews.title: Open at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: The Carolina Reaper sauce was not sealed properly. Upon removing the plastic seal, sauce splattered into my face and i had to make a desperate run up to the kitchen sink. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker B

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit for Beginner Chili Heads!
customer_reviews.text: Individually these hot sauces are not too hot for their presentation value. However, cumulatively they are pretty hot. If you want to crank it up a notch do a teaspoon of each waiting 30-45 seconds between. This is a good beginner chili-head kit. And I love that the only ingredients that changes is the pepper type, this helps with the ability to taste the peppers also.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Carolina Reaper is REALLY HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Carolina Reaper is as hot advertised. Still, it’s good & I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor but lack of heat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad since we like to test our limits with spicy foods. Sauces taste good but we were disappointed by the lack of heat on the last bottle, Carolina Reaper. The scorpion pepper was hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for that much Hot fun!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Fun product! Very clever. Our group had some folks that only lasted about 5 levels of Heat, and Wow The Heat Was AWESOME! 2 guys made it to the TOP of the Pyramid! thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great Sauces!
customer_reviews.text: These came in a nice box and were great sauces. I was a little disappointed in the size of the bottles, but for the price they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Trinityrose26

customer_reviews.title: Feelin Hot
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun! I gave to my brother in law for Christmas and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Bubberz

customer_reviews.title: Teen boy joy!
customer_reviews.text: There was a mistake and 2 sauces were missing/doubled. The company sent the correct sauces out as soon as they learned of the mistake! 100% hapoy tween boys!!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of many minions

customer_reviews.title: Fun game included!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize, as well as tasty hot sauces, this is a game! We had so much fun playing the hot sauce challenge. Gave this as a gift to my daughter's boyfriend, and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Competition where the winners get heartburn.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my brother-in-law, who loves pushing the boundaries of pain via capsaicin. Not all the sauces taste good but they are hot.
customer_reviews.author: Happy.Home.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste and a lot of heat!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves all kinds of hot sauce, the more heat the better, and this kit is amazing! All the sauces have great flavor to them. My orignal package had a duplicate sauce and the seller was very quick to reach out and make sure it was corrected! 5 stars on product and service! :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Giftable, spicy, tasty
customer_reviews.text: The best part of gifting this set is watching them try it. I love that even some of the hottest sauces had flavour rather than just heat.
customer_reviews.author: Art Buff

customer_reviews.title: Hot Sauce Bundle
customer_reviews.text: While we didn't use this for games, my family has enjoyed it as it has several different flavors that each person can enjoy; depending upon their preference.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not spicy enough for a challenge but flavor is good
customer_reviews.text: Simply not spicy enough for it to be called a challenge. we went through the challenge twice and both times were disappointed by spice level. The flavor was actually good though, we have since decided to use the sauces on food instead and had good results.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: A game for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Great game for those up to the challenge. We had a great time!
customer_reviews.author: jane a

customer_reviews.title: Its not has hot as it says
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is not represented properly. Description says going to be hot but not hot I was planning to use these on chicken wings . I was under the impression that the sauce was going to be as hot as it says on bottle. I'm not impressed by this at all. I would like refund or even credit. Seeing this is way misrepresented.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Just a spicey version of Tabasco. Very vinegary . Dont bother
customer_reviews.author: sdfishin

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but hot? ...not
customer_reviews.text: If not for the fact this is supposed to be hot I’d give it a good review I really like the taste, but if it’s the challenge hot you seek look else ware. As far as the hot challenge this would be a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Clark E.

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My friend said the game was fun but the sauces all had a very vinegary flavor. If you don't like vinegar these aren't the sauces for you. Not very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Raettig

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a issue with first box the immediately set a whole new box. They were amazing tasting and had a blast with the whole family. Can't wait to take it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Standaman

customer_reviews.title: Not really hot.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a hot wing eating challenge at my pub, and although they tote that they use hot peppers these are toned down to make them less hot. We did not have one person drop out. These sauces are the sole reason the event flopped. Gave the packaging 5 stars because it looks good and got a guy like me to look like a sucker. Dont be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Not That Hot
customer_reviews.text: It was fun to take the challenge but no one quit during the challenge. The sauces are not that hot. Number 9 and 10 is when we started to sweat a little. The flavors were good but the spiciness was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Yummy sauces and good increase in intensity
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. Very tasty and works great. I think I ate about six ice cubes before my mouth started to return to normal after the hottest sauce! I just wish it were a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this hot sauce was going to be super hot but it really wasn’t. If you like hot stuff and are wanting a challenge I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a lot of fun to play with friends. Some of the sauces actually taste great rather then being hot. You definitely have to play by the instructions or it wont give you the game's effect. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lizxmarie

customer_reviews.title: Great sauces, great flavors, great way to feel your body go numb!
customer_reviews.text: At first the hot sauce set up was fantastic. The flavor of most of the sauces were amazing and had excellent kick. The only complaint is that I am dumb enough to do the challenge and face the repercussions not once, but twice. Body went numb and started to drool and everything. Would recommend to everyone though
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

customer_reviews.title: WEAK WATERY SAUCES,  NOT EVEN FRANK'S RED HOT LEVEL
customer_reviews.text: Sauces are watery and the hottest sauce is just a bit spicey like Frank's red hot the other flavors taste are weak and come out the bottles like a weird watery pepper juice instead a sauce. Would not buy for useable sauces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good birthday gift, the bottom 7 sauces weren’t that hot but some had good flavors. The top 3 weren’t as hot as expected (the Scoville units are for the peppers themselves and the hot sauce loses some of that in the manufacturing process) but still fun to try. If you’re looking for hotter, Daves insanity is a better “hot” hot sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun Challenge
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great gift taste are amazing and some are very hot
customer_reviews.author: That one guy

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good little game for people not too accustomed to spicy foods, but not bad overall.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Small and too much money
customer_reviews.text: this is way to small! I expected larger portions. The box was cheap as well. Flavor was not noticeable through the different hot sauces, very bland and vinegary.
customer_reviews.author: brett.

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift to two family members and friend...well received & appreciated...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I originally purchased these to prepare for a hot sauce challenge. Well, I still have a ton left in each bottle and have been slowly but surely using them. It’s nice because they don’t go bad and I can keep one in my purse if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute idea, BUT
customer_reviews.text: every one made it to the end sauces were not hot, nor did they taste good. cute idea
customer_reviews.author: marc schoen

customer_reviews.title: Missing items - Fixed
customer_reviews.text: Was missing the hatch valley Anaheim pepper and red cayenne pepper. Sent duplicate other ones. Edited review after company sent a complete new box with the all the spices to fix the missing sauces
customer_reviews.author: Tim Y

customer_reviews.title: Not at all hot, BOO
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to have fun at a party and see who was up for the challenge and were extremely disappointed, the Carolina Reaper (hottest sauce number 10) tasted like tabasco....don't bother, this is a scam....
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Spicy but not terribly hot
customer_reviews.text: Giving only 4 stars because my husband thought they were not crazy spicy. Presentation is great, one of he flavors was repeated
customer_reviews.author: Vanchi83

customer_reviews.title: Fun for spice lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun gift for spice lovers. There is flavor too. Great gift set!
customer_reviews.author: Allana

product_meta.title: Hot Sauce Gift Set Pepper Challenge - 10 Sauces, From 10 Hot Peppers, the Hottest Carolina Reaper, 2 million Scoville Units, to the Mild Banana Pepper at 300. The Pepper Pyramid Sampler by, BYOB
product_meta.description:
This is the Best Hot Sauce sampler you'll ever purchase!

If you want to:

 * Have the most fun with your family and friends.
 * Find your new favorite hot sauce.
 * Include everyone from Granny to hard core Harry.
 * Find out how much of a Chile Head you really are.

Because this starts out with a Banana Pepper which has no heat and slowly works it's way up to the World Record holding Carolina Reaper, you can include everyone in the fun. See just how far up the Pepper Pyramid they can go.

Don't hesitate - now is the time - test how much of a Chile Head you are! - Order Now!
feature_bullets: GREAT GIFT! The most FUN you will ever have while burning your lips off. Climb the Pepper Pyramid as High as you dare. Made with peppers that rate from 300 to 2 million scoville. It's a game the whole family can play.

AMAZING SAUCE! You can be happy with knowing that you will find a hot sauce with just the right amount of heat. Sure to be the Best Hot Sauce you have ever had and you will want to put it on everything.

THE 10 BEST CHILI PEPPERS! This is a pepper challenge. The scoville ratings are for the pepper itself. Sauces will not be as hot, because of the added ingredients, but each sauce is made exactly the same to get a true comparison of the heat from each pepper.

EXCITING! Set of Official Game Rules ensures an undisputed champion can be named. Each sample bottle provides enough servings for 10 players to play 100 times. But you will probably use your favorite sauce for more than just playing the game. SUPER FUN activity that all of your friends and family can enjoy.
100% GUARANTEED! The Best Gift for the Hot Sauce Lover. A full 90 day no-risk 100% Money Back Guarantee. See why Amazon customers rate our Pepper Pyramid Challenge 5-Stars and Highly Recommended!”
